newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China's Zhaoqing Huajin sets US$10 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: China's Zhaoqing Huajin sets US$10 mln loan.

text.p: The following syndicated loan issue was announced on Tuesday by the arrangers.

The issuer is a Sino-foreign joint venture established in 1994. Its principal activities include the production and printing of paper boxes, paper tubes and other packaging materials. Details are as follows:
BORROWER ZHAOQING HUAJIN PACKAGE PRINTING CO LTD
GUARANTOR GUANGDONG OVERSEAS CHINESE TRUST & INVESTMENT CORP
AMOUNT US$10 MLN TYPE TERM LOAN
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE HOME CTRY CHINA
DRAWDOWN ONE LUMP SUM AVAIL -- REPLIES 06.NOV.96
REPAYMENT FOUR EQUAL SEMI-ANNUAL INSTALMENTS COMMENCING 18
NOTES PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO FINANCE THE PURCHASE OF
EQUIPMENT UNDER AN EXPANSION PLAN. SECURITY IS PROVIDED
BY A LETTER OF COMFORT ISSUED BY THE ZHAOQING MUNICIPAL
ARRANGERS AB CAPITAL MARKETS (HK) AND STANDARD CHARTERED BANK MGT LEVELS AND FEES NOT DISCLOSED
